com.app

Class BoardGame

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.app.BoardGame

  • public class BoardGame
extends java.lang.Object
    The Class BoardGame.
    Author:
    Pratik Singleton Class to ensure that there exists only 1 board for game to be played on Start point of the game. This class has the main function This class initializes the collection of personality cards, 12 areas and collection of random event cards.
